values.description: The Iron Butterfly is an Option strategy that involves four Option contracts where the order of strike prices for the four contracts is A>B>C.
values.keywords: multi-leg orders, iron butterfly option strategy, out-the-money call, profits from a decrease in price movement, profits from an increase in price movement, limited-reward-limited-risk strategy, risk of early assignment
